channel.title: Announcement on Gaia Sky
channel.description: Recent news in Announcement on Gaia Sky

item.title: New homepage
item.description: Today we publish the new Gaia Sky web site. If you are reading this, you obviously know it. I’ve been working on this for a while, and, even though it is not yet finished, I think it is now ready to be deployed. Until now, we have used the website of our institute, which uses the Typo3 CMS, as our home page. In a few days, I’ll make it point to this new site.
